-- Generated by Query Translation Utility

-- SUMMARY:
-- Reports Processed: 1
-- Queries Extracted: 1
-- Queries Translated: 1

-- ===== SSRS REPORTS =====
-- Report: SSRSReportSQLUtility.rdl
-- Datasets: DataSet2

-- ===== TRANSLATED QUERY 1 =====
-- Source: DataSet2
-- Type: dataset_query
-- Original Query:
-- SELECT
--     ORG.ORGANIZATION_SK,
--     ORG.ORGANIZATION_BK,
--     ORG.ROW_STATUS ,
--     ORG.DQ_STATUS ,
-- 
--     PROV.PROVIDER_SK,
--     PROV.PROVIDER_BK,
--     PROV.ROW_STATUS ,
--     PROV.DQ_STATUS ,
-- 
--     PTC.PROVIDER_TYPE_CODE,
--     PTC.PROVIDER_TYPE_DESCRIPTION_TEXT,
--     PTC.ROW_STATUS ,
--     PTC.DQ_STATUS ,
-- 
--     PTO.PROVIDER_TYPE_OFFICIAL_CODE,
--     PTO.PROVIDER_TYPE_OFFICIAL_DESCRIPTION_TEXT,
--     PTO.ROW_STATUS ,
--     PTO.DQ_STATUS 
-- 
-- FROM ORGANIZATION ORG
-- INNER JOIN PROVIDER PROV ON ORG.SOURCE_SYSTEM_SK = PROV.SOURCE_SYSTEM_SK
-- LEFT JOIN PROVIDER_TYPE_CODE PTC ON PROV.SOURCE_SYSTEM_SK = PTC.SOURCE_SYSTEM_SK
-- LEFT JOIN PROVIDER_TYPE_OFFICIAL PTO ON PROV.SOURCE_SYSTEM_SK = PTO.SOURCE_SYSTEM_SK

-- Translated Query:
SELECT
    ORG.ORGANIZATION_SK,
    ORG.ORGANIZATION_BK,
    ORG.ROW_STATUS ,
    ORG.DQ_STATUS ,

    PROV.PROVIDER_SK,
    PROV.PROVIDER_BK,
    PROV.ROW_STATUS ,
    PROV.DQ_STATUS ,

    PTC.PROVIDER_TYPE_CODE,
    PTC.PROVIDER_TYPE_DESCRIPTION_TEXT,
    PTC.ROW_STATUS ,
    PTC.DQ_STATUS ,

    PTO.PROVIDER_TYPE_OFFICIAL_CODE,
    PTO.PROVIDER_TYPE_OFFICIAL_DESCRIPTION_TEXT,
    PTO.ROW_STATUS ,
    PTO.DQ_STATUS 

FROM ORGANIZATION ORG
INNER JOIN PROVIDER PROV ON ORG.SOURCE_SYSTEM_SK = PROV.SOURCE_SYSTEM_SK
LEFT JOIN PROVIDER_TYPE_CODE PTC ON PROV.SOURCE_SYSTEM_SK = PTC.SOURCE_SYSTEM_SK
LEFT JOIN PROVIDER_TYPE_OFFICIAL PTO ON PROV.SOURCE_SYSTEM_SK = PTO.SOURCE_SYSTEM_SK
